document_data.name: Harbor master
document_data.mainbody: This [[human]] was the '''harbor master''' of the village of [[Highcliff]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.History: The harbor master tried to convince a ship captain to remain in the village, but failed, and the ship sailed off. When the boat was attacked by [[lizardfolk]], the harbor master and his sailors had to rescue them.
